reference.title: localtime : convert time to local representation

section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: localtime converts the time at clock into local time, then converts its representation from the arithmetic representation to the traditional representation defined by struct tm.
localtime constructs the traditional time representation in static storage; each call to gmtime or localtime will overwrite the information generated by previous calls to either function.
mktime is the inverse of localtime.

section.title: Returns
section.p: A pointer to the traditional time representation (struct tm).
